name: Voicepad
body: # Description: VoicePad is a Text Editor which works on Voice Recognition. It types what you say, obey basic commands like cut, copy, paste, find, replace, open, close, save, new file, etc. It supports different fonts, text color, size and alignment. Also supports PDF format. ##Demo Video ##Achievements 1st price in Software Development Competition, Credenzâ€™14, PICT, Pune.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
